overview: Something has happened. Ten men have struggled to shore, washed up on a muddy beach and lucky to be alive. They are dirty and tired, hungry and desperate. They will do anything to get rescued--and anything to survive! The sun is blistering and brutal, the beach dry and hot. To live they must enter the thick, mysterious jungle and fend for themselves in what will become an adventure of a lifetime!
tagline: Ten Men. One Island. An Eruption of Lust and Desire!
title: Lords of the Jungle
